wissim.controller.filters.gui

Class AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.RowFilter
      • wissim.controller.filters.gui.AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport
  • Enclosing class:
    AdaptiveChoicesHandler

    static class AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport
extends javax.swing.RowFilter
    Helper class, holding, for each row and filter (editor or user defined), a bit defining whether it is filtered in or out.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) static class  AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.EditorHandle
      Helper class to handle an editor.
      (package private) static class  AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo
      Class to hold the filter information on a single row.
      This information is a bit per column, defining whether the column is filtered out or not

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class javax.swing.RowFilter

        javax.swing.RowFilter.ComparisonType, javax.swing.RowFilter.Entry<M,I>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.EditorHandle[] editorHandles
      An EditorHandle per editor (table model's column)
      The order is not important -it changes continuously while performing updates.
      private AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter[] filters
      Each of the defined .
      Elsewhere, it is kept as a Set, but here, it is needed to associate a column to each specific filter, so an array is chosen
      The first N filters correspond to the N filters of each editor, sorted by column order.
      Note that any of the first N filters could be null, if there is no column on that position (column removed from model)
      private ChoicesHandler.RowEntry rowEntry
      A single instance to check the filters of every row/column.
      private java.util.ArrayList<AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo> rows
      A RowInfo for each row on the table model.

      Only constructor; note: the parameter allFilters set is modified on the constructor.

    • Field Detail

      • rows

        private java.util.ArrayList<AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo> rows
        A RowInfo for each row on the table model.

      • rowEntry

        private ChoicesHandler.RowEntry rowEntry
        A single instance to check the filters of every row/column.

      • editorHandles

        private AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.EditorHandle[] editorHandles
        An EditorHandle per editor (table model's column)
        The order is not important -it changes continuously while performing updates.

      • filters

        private AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter[] filters
        Each of the defined .
        Elsewhere, it is kept as a Set, but here, it is needed to associate a column to each specific filter, so an array is chosen
        The first N filters correspond to the N filters of each editor, sorted by column order.
        Note that any of the first N filters could be null, if there is no column on that position (column removed from model)

        Handles a change on a filter.

      • updateRowInfo

        private int updateRowInfo(AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter filter,
                IFilter iFilter)
        Handles a change on a filter, updating the RowInfo array.
        Returns:
        an integer where the lower bit is 0 if the update implies no changes, and the next bit is 0 is the filter clears the whole table (i.e: no row passes the filter)

      • initChoices

        public void initChoices(IFilter iFilter)
        Forces the initialisation of the choices of a editor filter.

      • getFilter

        private AdaptiveChoicesHandler.AdaptiveChoicesSupport.RowInfo.Filter getFilter(IFilter filter)
        Returns the filter with the given IFilter.

      • extractChoices

        private void extractChoices(int handles,
                  int firstRow,
                  int lastRow)
        Handles all the rows between firstRow and lastRow, updating the choices of the first handles in the editorHandles instance' variable.
        That is, the order of the variables in the editorHandlers variable is modified, so that only the first handles are updated
        Parameters:
        lastRow - can be -1 to represent the whole model

      • iterateRows

        private void iterateRows(int handles,
               int firstRow,
               int lastRow)
        handle all the rows in [firstRow, lastRow).
